mapper.insert: insert into IncludeSportEvents(event_id,sport_event_id) values((select auto_increment from information_schema.tables where table_schema = (select database()) and table_name = 'Events'),#{sportEventId})
mapper.select: select event_id as eventId , title , owner_id as ownerId , time_from as timeFrom , time_to as timeTo , place_id as placeId , event_type as eventType from Events where event_id = #{eventId}

select se.sport_event_id as sportEventId , se.name as name , se.comment as comment from SportEvents as se left join IncludeSportEvents as ise on se.sport_event_id = ise.sport_event_id where ise.event_id = #{event_id}
